title: parama mangaLadhE
sahitya:
parama mangaLadE brAhmyAdi mAtrukArUpE shivE ambA



anupallavi



niratavu ninna caraNava bhajipa vara bhaktara manOrathavanu pAlisuva



caraNam



nInE mahEshvariyu nInE kaumAriyu nInE varAhiyu nInE vaishNaviyu

nInE indrNiyu nInE cAmuNDEshvariyu nInE harikEsha ramaNi maNiyu
